Property Documentation

- (NSString *) autoScalingGroupName [read, write, retain]

The name or ARN of the Auto Scaling Group.

Constraints:
Length: 1 - 1600
Pattern: [---
]*

- (NSMutableArray *) metrics [read, write, retain]

The list of metrics to disable.

If no metrics are specified, all metrics are disabled. The following metrics are supported:

  • GroupMinSize

  • GroupMaxSize

  • GroupDesiredCapacity

  • GroupInServiceInstances

  • GroupPendingInstances

  • GroupTerminatingInstances

  • GroupTotalInstances
